text: Paris Saint-Germain Football Club, commonly known to as Paris Saint-Germain, Paris SG, Paris or PSG, is a French professional football club based in Paris. Founded in 1970, they compete in Ligue 1, the top division of French football. Their home stadium is the Parc des Princes. PSG have a long-standing rivalry with Olympique de Marseille. The rivalry is known as Le Classique. According to Forbes, PSG are worth $1.092b. == League positions == Season League Position 2000/01 Ligue 1 9th 2001/02 Ligue 1 4th 2002/03 Ligue 1 11th 2003/04 Ligue 1 2nd 2004/05 Ligue 1 12th 2005/06 Ligue 1 4th 2006/07 Ligue 1 15th 2007/08 Ligue 1 16th 2008/09 Ligue 1 6th 2009/10 Ligue 1 13th Season League Position 2010/11 Ligue 1 4th 2011/12 Ligue 1 2nd 2012/13 Ligue 1 Champions 2013/14 Ligue 1 Champions 2014/15 Ligue 1 Champions 2015/16 Ligue 1 Champions 2016/17 Ligue 1 2nd 2017/18 Ligue 1 Champions 2018/19 Ligue 1 Champions 2019/20 Ligue 1 Champions 2020/21 Ligue 1 2nd === Former positions === ==Players== :As of 1 February 2021. ===First-team squad=== ===Out on loan=== ===First-team appearances=== === Other players under contract === Apres Maccabi Petah tigueva * Shakhar Donesk ( prete as Fullam ) Tottenham ou vas joue Manor Salomon apres Word cup 2026 ou l Euro 2028 qui vas Joue Israel ci Dieu veu **** 1\. Red Bul Leipzig ou Stuttgart ( Budesliga ) ==Honours== :As of the end of the 2020–21 Ligue 1 season. ===Domestic=== *Ligue 1 **Winners (9): 1985–86, 1993–94, 2012–13, 2013–14, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2018–19, 2019–20 **Runners-up (9): 1988–89, 1992–93, 1995–96, 1996–97, 1999–2000, 2003–04, 2011–12, 2016–17, 2020–21 *Ligue 2 **Winners (1): 1970–71 *Coupe de France **Winners (14; record): 1981–82, 1982–83, 1992–93, 1994–95, 1997–98, 2003–04, 2005–06, 2009–10, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2019–20, 2020–21 **Runners-up (5): 1984–85, 2002–03, 2007–08, 2010–11, 2018–19 *Coupe de la Ligue **Winners (9; record): 1994–95, 1997–98, 2007–08, 2013–14, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2019–20 **Runners-up (1): 1999–2000 *Trophée des Champions **Winners (10; record): 1995, 1998, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020 **Runners-up (3): 2004, 2006, 2010 ===European=== *UEFA Champions League **Runners-up (1): 2019–20 *UEFA Cup Winners' Cup **Winners (1): 1995–96 **Runners-up (1): 1996–97 *UEFA Intertoto Cup **Winners (1): 2001 *UEFA Super Cup **Runners-up (1): 1996 ===Doubles and Trebles=== *Domestic Double (L1 and CdF) **Winners (4; record): 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2019–20 *League and League Cup Double (L1 and CdL) **Winners (5; record): 2013–14, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2019–20 *Domestic Cup Double (CdF and CdL) **Winners (7; record): 1994–95, 1997–98, 2014–15, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2019–20 *Domestic Treble (L1, CdF and CdL) **Winners (4; record): 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2019–20 *Domestic Quadruple (L1, CdF, CdL and TdC) **Winners (4; record): 2014–15, 2015–16, 2017–18, 2019–20 ==References== Category:French football clubs Category:1970 establishments in France Category:Football in Paris
